name: Triple Tap Attack
description:
Tap the screen and move forward while you hit your enemies!

Triple Tap features a unique addictive gameplay: you just have to click the screen as quick as possible to defeat every enemy while the stage keeps moving forward at the beat of your hits.

This fun-packed adventure set in a fantastic world where enemies and stages are constantly winking at retro gamers, will immediately turn into one of your favourite games. It’s charming graphic style based on the 80’s, and it’s addictive gameplay, will captivate both young and mature.

Enjoy the way new versions of classic villains challenge your tapping skills. Destroy them all and collect diamonds and antiquities to become the most successful hero among your friends! You will certainly play it thousands of times because there are many things to discover and infinite miles to run.

Features :
- Improve and obtain new members in your team
- Play with three heroes at a time
- Add mercenaries who will help you in your quest
- Collect diamonds and antiquities to become the wealthiest of all your friends
- Simple touch controls: just tap, tap and tap!
- Free to play

Tap, hit and run!
